FusionEngine::GlobalInputMap

FusionEngine::GlobalInputMap Class Reference

Keybindings for global functions. More...

#include <FusionInputMap.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Keybindings for global functions.

Remarks:
Note that this class has no 'type' (device) attribute because global inputs are allways from the keyboard.
